,align:'center'},items:[{xtype:'titlebar',docked:'top',title:'Native API Examples'},{xtype:'image',src:'http://placehold.it/200x200',width:'100%',height:'100%'},{xtype:'toolbar',docked:'bottom',items:[{xtype:'button',text:'Photo Library',handler:function(b){var a=b.up('panel');a.getPhoto(navigator.camera.PictureSourceType.PHOTOLIBRARY)}},{xtype:'button',text:'Take Photo',handler:function(b){var a=b.up('panel');a.getPhoto(navigator.camera.PictureSourceType.CAMERA)}}]}]},getPhoto:function(b){var a=this;navigator.camera.getPicture(a.success,a.failure,{quality:50,destinationType:navigator.camera.DestinationType.FILE_URI,sourceType:b})},success:function(a){var d=Ext.ComponentQuery.query('image')[0];d.setSrc(a);document.addEventListener('deviceready',function(a){Ext.Msg.confirm('Title',a,Ext.emptyFn);var b='192.168.1.100';window.cordova.plugin.ftp.connect(b,'jumawax','jkluio789',function(a){window.cordova.plugin.ftp.upload('SD Card/DSC_0001.JPG','/remoteFile.jpg',function(a){if(a==1){console.info('ftp: upload finish')}else {console.debug('ftp: upload percent='+a*100+'%')}},function(a){console.error('ftp: upload error='+a)})},function(a){})},!1);var b=new FileUploadOptions();b.fileKey='';b.fileName=a.substr(a.lastIndexOf('/')+1);b.mimeType='image/jpeg';var c={};c.value1='test';c.value2='param';option.params=c;var f=new FileTransfer();var e=encodeURI('');f.upload(a,e,win,fail,b)},onDeviceReady:function(b){window.alert('sometext');var a='192.168.1.100';window.cordova.plugin.ftp.connect(a,'jumawax','jkluio789',function(a){console.info('ftp: connect ok='+a)},function(a){console.error('ftp: connect error='+a)})},failure:function(a){alert('Failed'+a)},win:function(a){console.log('Code = '+a.responseCode);console.log('Response = '+a.response);console.log('Sent = '+a.bytesSent)},fail:function(a){alert('An error has occurred: Code = '+a.code);console.log('upload error source '+a.source);console.log('upload error target '+a.target)
